blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

body:
2019:

Phil posts his first video. You can tell he hasn’t shaved in a few days but it’s not alarming.


He posts his second video. Scruff is definitely present, but still, nobody really questions it.


By his fourth video it’s clear. He has a proper beard now.


The beard gets progressively longer, and shaggier, and scruffier as the year goes on. He never mentions it. Dan never mentions it. It’s as if the beard doesn’t exist. But it does. People are begging for answers. Phil ignores us.


2020: Phil posts his first video. Clean shaven. Everything is normal again. The beard is never acknowledged.

reblog.comment:

By his fourth video it’s clear. He has a proper beard now.


The beard gets progressively longer, and shaggier, and scruffier as the year goes on. He never mentions it. Dan never mentions it. It’s as if the beard doesn’t exist. But it does. People are begging for answers. Phil ignores us.


2020: Phil posts his first video. Clean shaven. Everything is normal again. The beard is never acknowledged.

trail.content_raw:

The beard gets progressively longer, and shaggier, and scruffier as the year goes on. He never mentions it. Dan never mentions it. It’s as if the beard doesn’t exist. But it does. People are begging for answers. Phil ignores us.

summary: I'm certain that Dan and Phil would earn most of their video income from the gaming channel. They upload regularly and get lots...
question: I'm certain that Dan and Phil would earn most of their video income from the gaming channel. They upload regularly and get lots of views. There's no way they are getting rid of that unless they intend on committing to a regular uploading schedule on their solo channels. The whole point of the gaming channel was to get regular easy uploads.
answer: You predicted this hiatus conundrum! I guess only time will tell…???

summary: what do you think of Dan's merch?
question: what do you think of Dan's merch?
answer: Not for me, but I’m not the target audience. I think it’s definitely aimed toward the younger teenage portion of his audience who, to be fair, are the portion of the audience most likely to buy and wear obvious YouTuber merch.

reblog.comment: Not for me, but I’m not the target audience. I think it’s definitely aimed toward the younger teenage portion of his audience who, to be fair, are the portion of the audience most likely to buy and wear obvious YouTuber merch.
